Introduction
This topic contains information on SC for chronic diseases, including
definition of a chronic disease
establishing whether a disease is chronic
considering
SC for a chronic disease
, and
presumptive SC
establishing presumptive SC for chronic diseases
, and
action to take if a chronic disease was
treated in service
, and
not treated in service
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 5 - Service Connection (SC) for Chronic Diseases
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 5, Section None
